body: Uhh, based on what little I could translate myself, this is about a ghost who's raping girls while being invisible. One girl, Yamako, witnesses one of the ghost's raping and the ghost finds out that Yamako can see it. Horrified, Yamako asks a priest for protection only to get a wooden dildo that summons a god? After having sex with the god, Yamako meets the ghost again who rapes her. After the god protects Yamako once (before leaving after using up his power) the ghost tries to rape her again only for Yamako to reverse rape back. It's then revealed that the ghosts is some fat NEET (?) who simply wanted a girl to have consensual sex with (?) and is thus purified. The ghost thanks Yamako and leaves, but that only leaves Yamako pissed off.

Needs translation.

This guy is the author "Tomo-chan Wa Onnanoko!" a lovely manga about a tomboy, who would have imagined that author-san have pretty kinky taste for hentai.
I want the lore of this story. Wtf is going on
